short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip those skippable or unskippable video ads!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
Instant Ad Skipper For Youtube™ enables (auto) instant ad skipping functionality on Youtube™. It helps you skip those 5-second skippable ads and unskippable ads that you have to watch until the end.

Instead of blocking ads which requires accessing network traffic and compromising privacy and security, this extension will only simply clicks the skip for you.

This extension is completely free. However, if you find this extension useful, you may support me through donation.

How to use:
1. If you have opened some Youtube™ pages before installing this extension, you might have to refresh those pages. Alternatively, you can restart the browser.
2. Pin this extension to access the controls and enjoy!
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,it:
**Important message: Youtube™ has recently been doing rapid changes to its ad architecture. If you found that this extension is not working one day, please wait for updates!

Features:
- Enables (auto) instant ad skipping functionality on Youtube™
- Skips 5-second skippable ads
- Skips unskippable ads that you have to watch until the end

Instead of blocking ads which requires accessing network traffic and compromising privacy and security, this extension will only simply clicks the skip for you.

This extension is completely free. However, if you find this extension useful, you may support me through donation.

How to use:
1. If you have opened some Youtube™ pages before installing this extension, you might have to refresh those pages. Alternatively, you can restart the browser.
2. Pin this extension to access the controls and enjoy!
